hotels.title: Great Ocean Road Escape at Lorne's Only Beachfront Hotel with Mineral Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Set off for Victoria's iconic Great Ocean Road and immerse yourself in scenic seaside charm at Mantra Lorne, the beloved coastal town's only beachfront hotel. Built around Erskine House, the oldest operating guesthouse in Victoria, this heritage resort still provides all the modern comforts you need for a relaxing stay. What's more, youâ€™re in prime position to explore the rugged cliffs, quiet beaches, and lush forests of the Great Ocean Road, or Lorne's collection of boutiques, galleries and eateries. Set in 12 acres of landscaped gardens including tennis courts and croquet lawns, this seaside resort has everything you need right on your doorstep. Take a dip in the heated mineral pool, unwind in the steam room or enjoy a hearty meal at The Larder.
